Text.Page:
We believe the nexulitic fragments will help us enter the Nexus Traverse and track down the source of these nexuses.

But we are spread thin on research; there are too many powerful monsters.

Can you help us? We really need your help.

The sovereign needs investigating. You should gather a team of more than 10 for this. The sovereign is a really strong monster.

Also, be smart in your use of the nexulitic by-product. It can prove really useful.

Oh! Thank you so much!

We learned a lot thanks to you.
Please hurry. We are running out of time!
